name: Howard Rankin
offering: , Book Publishing Classes, Book Writing Coach, Business Consulting, Copywriting, Ghost Writers, Online Course Creation, Podcast Host, Speaker Training
what_you_do: Howard Rankin is a renowned addictions, relationship, and personal coach who helps individuals transform their lives by overcoming addiction and trauma through various coaching methods and courses.
who_you_serve: Howard serves individuals seeking to overcome addiction, trauma, and improve their personal relationships, including thought leaders and celebrities.
signature_programs: Courses on Weight Loss Leads to Weight Gain, Overcoming Guilt and Shame, The Miracle Within You, How to Really Change a Habit, Addiction Recovery, Communication, The Seven Pillars of Support
service_provided: 1:1 coaching, group programs, courses, speaking, consulting
current_projects: Creating courses on various topics related to addiction and personal development.
bio: Best-selling author of over fifty self-help books, featured in major media outlets including BBC, CNN, and Wall St. Journal, with a radio show that has 1.5 million listeners in 30 countries.
business_focus: Howard Rankin is a renowned addictions, relationship, and personal coach who helps individuals transform their lives by overcoming addiction and trauma through various coaching methods and courses. (addiction coaching)
